text: Archbishop Paul Bùi Văn Đọc (11 November 1944 – 6 March 2018) was a Vietnamese prelate of the Catholic Church. He served as the Archbishop of Ho Chi Minh City from 2014 to 2018 and the President of the Catholic Bishops' Conference of Vietnam from 2013 to 2016. He died of a stroke in Rome on 6 March 2018 at the age of 73.Đức Giám Mục Phaolô Bùi Văn Đọc, Tổng Giám Mục Giáo Phận Sàigòn, đã qua đời tại Vatican ==References== ==Other websites== *Catholic Hierarchy: Archbishop Paul Bùi Văn Đọc Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Vietnamese Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Paul Bùi Văn Đọc
